short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Blocks dangerous websites that distribute malware and prevents phishing attacks.
short.de: Blockt gefährliche Webseiten die Malware verbreiten, und beugt Phishing-Attacken vor.
short.fr: Bloque les sites Web dangereux qui distribuent des logiciels malveillants et prévient les attaques d'hameçonnage.
short.it: Blocca i siti pericolosi che distribuiscono i malware e previeni gli attacchi di phishing.
short.ru: Блокирует опасные веб-сайты, распространяющие вредоносные программы, и предотвращает фишинговые атаки.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Emsisoft Browser Security protects you from bad websites and prevents phishing attacks without tracking your activity. 

This privacy-conscious browser extension is lightweight and lightning-fast. It blocks access to websites that distribute malware and prevents phishing attacks that try to steal your passwords, while still giving you the flexibility to visit the sites you trust. 

Emsisoft Browser Security uses privacy-conscious security technology, so it does not collect your browsing activity data. Your browsing history is your business. Keeping you safe online is ours. 

No browsing activity tracking. Just security.
long.de,fr,it,ru: Blocks dangerous websites that distribute malware and prevents phishing attacks.
